title: This is mid lane Ekko
body:
Ap glyphs
Ap quints
2 Ap seals

Walk into lane

Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
Q Wave
...

Interactive

replies.body:
No they don't lmfao they constantly trade with the enemy laners and attempt to kill them
Ekko is mostly just Q waveclearing for most of laning

if ekko uses his  Q CD to waveclear everytime, and you don't manage to kill him

you're actually bad at the game then

This is literally what every single Ekko I see does 
From my own d3-d1 elo games to the Challenger/masters ones i watch on streams

And then they usually roam or look to make a pick on the enemy jungler after shoving in lane

it doesn't matter what he does

non-interactive lanes are only unfun if they cannot be dealt with
ekko wasting his Q everytime on minions makes him an easy target for most laners

without forgetting that i never saw an ekko oneshotting a minion wave

I never said he did
I'm just saying most Ekkos tend to Q spam the wave early and shove really hard

He oneshots the casters like most mages post lvl 9 but before then he pushes harder than most mids usually do
I don't have an issue with the play style I'm just calling it for what it is

That's likely because of the lane opponent.

If the Ekko is given the chance to do that, chances are either his opponent is trying to kill him constantly and he backs off, or his enemy is playing incredibly safe.

I have played ekko every now and then mid lane, and every lane opponent does similar things once they buy a {{item:3165}} . Just constant waveclear with spell and back off unless you get too close, in which case CC > nuke.

Ekko's Q has range with the extension, yes, but uhhh... it's both delayed and slow compared to other mid laners.
i have more ideas than you will ever have LOL

the mods will ban me if i start to insult children on this board

so i'm just going to black list some folk in the meantime

{{item:1055}}  when we all know the new meta slave is {{item:1054}}

the fact that you got upvoted is so sad because there's really no comparison with what i said and what you just said

clearly i'm talking about ekko starting at level 1 2 shotting a wave with Q using that rune set up and that's all he does during laning at almost no mana cost, the same style of play that has gotten a number of mid lane champs dumpstered

but i guess even speaking english isn't enough, i need to hold your hand while i do it too
Very thorough argument you laid out, flawless. /s
More interactive than heimer.
Heimerdinger just places turrets and AFKs. If someone tries to hit him he throws a grenade and stuns them, then AFKs again.
You act like most midllaners don't have a spam waveclear ability

> [{quoted}](name=Cosmic Warper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RwjqhnvA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-10T16:02:34.905+0000)
>
> You act like most midllaners don't have a spam waveclear ability

There are tons of mid lane mages that can't wave clear effectively. Vladimir my one trick is a good example.
there are also tons of midlane mages that can waveclear effectively. what's your point?

A lot of typical meta mid laners often include high waveclear champions to avoid the hassle of farming.
{{champion:134}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:112}}  for instance often get a single AP item then wipe wave after wave with spells.
Not as efficient as Ekko from level 1.
{{champion:3}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:115}}

Galio's waveclear is overtuned and is being targeted via Doran's nerfs.

Morde is manaless.

Syndra not really.

Annie CSs well with her Mana refund on Q, but she doesn't push like Ekko.

Karthus not really, not until E starts doing work.

Kayle does pretty well, yea.

Didn't/Isn't Rumble's level 1 shove being nerfed?

Taliyah yes

Ziggs goes oom real quick doing what Ekko does.
starting at level 1 right
so what, ekko is OP now? The boards couldn't find anyone else to circlejerk about so they pick ekko? lmao

why are you so confused?  i already posted my thoughts, why do you insist on pulling your pants down the instant someone manages to talk about a champion?  are you that eager to circlejerk with all the hipsters who complain about circlejerking?
Cause {{champion:99}} no{{champion:7}} championc{{champion:63}}  waveclear{{champion:34}} nope{{champion:136}} not{{champion:268}} a{{champion:134}} single{{champion:115}} one.
Not like Ekko. They actually play the lane, Ekko just throws a Q and walks away twice every wave.
Oh please. That's up to the person playing ekko, not the champion. Any of those up there could just throw down a waveclear spell, clear the wave, and walk away.

Ye just that Lux E has like half of Ekkos Q base dmg at rank 1 and higher cooldown, Ahri and Vel Koz have less dmg and less range too, LB has to dash into the wave, Annie, Azir and Anivia cant wave clear and Ziggs and Syndra dont hit the whole wave and dont have as much dmg.

> less range too

"intense laughing" 
yeah i'm not going to waste my time with this. 
>Azir and Anivia cant wave clear 

AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH
edit: this is what i was looking for 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_n5E7feJHw0
So Ahris 880 range Q has more range than Ekkos almost 1100 range Q? And Anivia/Azir can wave clear pre 6? Cause we are talking about early laning phase, I thought that was obvious lol.
He's actually right.  Ekko Q is longer than Ahri Q if you include its slow part, and Vel's waveclear is his W and/or E, both of which are not very long ranged.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RwjqhnvA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-06-10T16:09:20.396+0000)

I've played Annie her wave clear is not the best. She has high mama costs and can't do it consistently without recalling.

the fact that you're being upvoted is so sad because only a fool can believe {{champion:63}} and {{champion:99}} can wave clear at all, let alone from level 1

Am I the only one who doesn't experience this when playing Ekko? Usually I'm able to trade and get some kills early if I land my W. Could you explain more about what the problem is, or propose a solution to fix it?

I just got Ekko and I don't feel like his wave clear makes him OP and it's not like I'm scared when I play against him. Also whoever posted this forgets that there is also someone else in lane so unless they are a potato(The other laner not who posted this) you should be pressing more than Q.

hey atleast we walks up close to do it.
{{champion:101}} I don't even see him enough and when i do he's already trying to kite me.

(this post is like a memes and games post lol)

Xerath can't only Q the wave early.  He needs at least Morello to kill the casters with one Q (unless he got fed early ofc).

His Q also goes up to a 120 mana cost, so if he is clearing every wave with a Q -> W for instance, he'll have to recall in a couple minutes.  If he gets to proc his passive, he's obviously getting in range of at least a minion, which is an opportunity to hit him back.  Range is also pretty much his entire advantage.
God bless removal of runes?
Maybe because trading with an enemy in lane is disadvantageous for ekko? idk im just talking out of my ass here
This is Galio. Except all you need is two doran's and you're good to go full tank.

I supposed you'd rather he halfs your health by trading 1 time with you, then.

If he was more 'interactive' I'd be willing to bet you'd be making a post but It'd be about how fast you die and how little interaction you had.

yeah?  so ?  lmao i really have no idea what problem I would have with someone complaining if ekko could do that at lvl 1.  oh wait you just want to complain about complaining, sorry i stopped your masturbation session, plz cont.
Ok?
